channel.title: VIM on RichardStrnad.ch
channel.description: Recent content in VIM on RichardStrnad.ch

item.title: Some nice and helpful VIM shortcuts
item.description: For whatever reason I decided to give VIM a chance… crazy guy I am :) On a bit more serious note, I’m sure that VIM is really powerful if you ever get hang of it. In the past I worked for a long time with Sublime Text 3, which is really great! And in the last ~ year I switched to Visual Studio Code, which is great as well! Especially the multicursor mode is a nifty feature.
